mapper.sql: cid, title, slug, created, modified, type, tags, categories, hits, comments_num, allow_comment, allow_ping, allow_feed, status, author, gtm_create, gtm_modified

distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
,
from blog_content

mapper.insert: insert into blog_content (cid, title, slug, created, modified, type, tags, categories, hits, comments_num, allow_comment, allow_ping, allow_feed, status, author, gtm_create, gtm_modified, content ) values (#{cid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{slug,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modified,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categories,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{allowComment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{allowPing,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{allowFeed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gtmCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gtmModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update blog_content
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
slug = #{slug,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created = #{created,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modified = #{modified,jdbcType=BIGINT},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tags = #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
categories = #{categories,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hits = #{hits,jdbcType=INTEGER},
comments_num = #{commentsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
allow_comment = #{allowComment,jdbcType=INTEGER},
allow_ping = #{allowPing,jdbcType=INTEGER},
allow_feed = #{allowFeed,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gtm_create = #{gtmCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gtm_modified = #{gtmModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update blog_content set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, slug = #{slug,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created = #{created,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modified = #{modified,jdbcType=BIGINT}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tags = #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, categories = #{categories,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hits = #{hits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comments_num = #{commentsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, allow_comment = #{allowComment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, allow_ping = #{allowPing,jdbcType=INTEGER}, allow_feed = #{allowFeed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gtm_create = #{gtmCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gtm_modified = #{gtmModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
